SINT_Prompt_Task.Objective: Consensus roadmap for open data governance balancing privacy, utility, and interoperability.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Context: PII handling; licensing; APIs/standards; civic innovation; vendor lock-in risks.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Methodology: Debates (N=3) with Step 3B (Consensus); integration and prioritization without criticism.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Finalization_Protocol: Ratings at Step 2; strict XML; PCG; MSV; Dual Output + Verification; measurable targets and review cadence.
